overview: Kristen has worked for Fortune 500 retail companies on both coasts in planning and merchandising roles. She is a Fashion Institute of Design & Merchandising (FIDM) alumna and recipient of the Wilkes Bashford Award for Excellence in Merchandise Product Development. Most recently, Kristen founded e-commerce menswear company, Sabøteur, in 2010. Sabøteur was covered in The New York Times, Wired, FastCompany, Inc., and BoingBoing. Kristen brings 10+ years retailing experience and fashion expertise to Monogram.
